name: XCTExpectedFailure.Options
desc: Options that determine how the test matches the expected failure to an actual test failure, and whether an unfulfilled expected failure results in a test failure.

items.name: var issueMatcher: (XCTIssue) -> Bool
items.desc: A block of code that determines whether the test issue fulfills the expected failure.

items.name: class func nonStrict() -> XCTExpectedFailure.Options
items.desc: Options that specify that an unfulfilled expected failure doesn’t generate a test failure.

items.name: var isEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the test checks for the expected failure.

items.name: var isStrict: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the test reports an error if the expected failure doesn’t occur.
